## useOffers() function

Get all the offers for a listing

## Example

```javascript
const { data: offers, isLoading, error } = useOffers(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, <listingId>);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useOffers(
  contract: RequiredParam<Marketplace>,
  listingId: RequiredParam<BigNumberish>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult<
  import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk").ContractEvent<Record<string, any>>[],
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                          | Description                               |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| contract  | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;Marketplace&gt;  | an instance of a Marketplace contract     |
| listingId | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;BigNumberish&gt; | the id of the listing to fetch offers for |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult&lt;import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk").ContractEvent&lt;Record&lt;string, any&gt;&gt;\[\], unknown&gt;

## Remarks

Fetch all the offers for a specified direct or auction listing.
